description:
This wildly popular game is back and now available for WebOS! 

Trampoline Boy exploded onto the scene in 1999 as an online flash game.  It captured the hearts of hundreds and has received several accolades including an honorary shockwave site of the day.

This simple yet engaging iPhone game retains the quirkiness and enduring sense of humor.  It is guaranteed to make you smile every time you pick it up.

Please do not try these tricks in the real world.

How to Play:

The object of the game is to jump on the trampoline and do as many flips as you can without falling off.

While in the air, use swipe gestures to make Trampoline Boy flip.   
Faster swipes = faster flips.

While Trampoline Boy is spinning, tap the screen to catch the spin and prepare for the landing.  For finer tuning, moving your finger while holding the tap.

Landing straight will produce the best bounce.  Caution: Not landing properly may lead to serious injuries.
